effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.

short_effect.x_y: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

flavor_text.x_y: The user blasts the target with power that distorts even time. The user can’t move on the next turn.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user blasts the target with power that distorts even time. The user can’t move on the next turn.
